docna.cdata!:
Haiti - Fourth Education And Training
            Project : Credit 1592 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Haiti - Fourth Education And
            Training Project : Credit 1592 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Haiti - Fourth Education and Training Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The credit would help finance the
            Government's education reform program (grades 1-10), by
            continuing with basic education reform, initiating a reform
            of the vocational/technical training system and
            strengthening the education sector management. In addition,
            a public administration inservice training program would be started.
